column5: Well so that don't have an unexplained absence, I will be leaving to go to Greece for a month tomorrow. YES, I will be fishing, both the conventional kind and with the spear gun. I will have some pics upon my return and hopefully some will include fish. Have a great month everyone and I will try and check in while overseas, but not too much of a guarantee with all the chasing that will be going on while there.
What will you be "chasing" bill ! lol  Have fun fella!
How did the Greeks win their last war?  Surprise attack from the front.     Enjoy your trip.
More than one thing, but you can figure it out I am sure
hope ya have a great time over there, cant wait to see the pics, remember that the best trophy isnt always the biggest. lol  have a safe and fun trip.  jason
Have a great time Bill!!!  Be sure to take lots of pics and post a nice long report when you get back.  Take notes after every day so you don't forget anything.....  Good luck and safe travels!
Why do most Greek men return to Greece?... because they miss their brothers behind!!!  Have a great time Bill, and good luck with the fish... and anything that smells like one!!!
Have a super trip, Bill. Team 7 will have a slew of entries for you when you get back.
Have a good one.  Did you find some snorkeling gear?  JF

No worries Bill... I will ensure ALL you're mothers needs are looked after  Please do not be offended if upon you're return you are asked to call me daddy.  Have a great trip brother.. looking forward to the report.  G
Have a GREAT time Bill!!!  Maureen

have a great safe trip.  don't worry when over there it's pretty easy to separate the men from the boys........all you need is a crow bar  (couldn't help it, there was already some jokes flying around  )
Have a great trip Bill...
They found a new use for sheep in Greece.................wool.  OPA!
Take care over there bud.Enjoy your time abroad and take lots of pics. Joe
Greece, where the men are men and the sheep are scared!!!  OPA!
Have a Great trip Bill.When you get back we will get out and do some fishing! Dan

Thanks for the well-wishes to most of you, I will of course have a detailed report upon my return. John, I did end up getting some gear but really appreciate you're generous offer. Thanks Glen, and I will take you're tip into consideration of course. Can't wait to get out for some Salmon upon my return Dan, and Gerritt, Up yours
Bwahahhahaha!.. have a safe, memorable trip... we need to get out before you head out to UBC though..  G
Yup, for sure Gerritt... It is UNBC but that's ok... I will be back the 8th of August and will start driving out on the 20th or so
Don't forget you're duct tape!!!
And your rubber boots.
Have a great vacation Bill
Have a blast Bill... and don't forget to pack the Colts... don't know if they sell 'em there! Gerritt, yer killin me! LOL HH
